coverage_details.outpatient_deductible_mpn: Nil / 15% up to 100.00 SR (at Minimum Provider Network)
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR800.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered. Organ transplantation (fresh or synthetic incl. donor medical costs, organ cost, cochlear & kidney transplants)
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 4,000.00, fully covered (sub-limits apply as per class for X-rays, fillings, root canal, extractions (incl. wisdom teeth), gum diseases, scaling/prophylaxis, checkups & risk assessment, one cleaning and scaling per year, fillings, root canal, and emergency dental); no sub-limits for surgical dental cases; annual checkup included. Anterior & posterior crowns not covered.
coverage_details.optical: SR 800.00, all lens types (including intraocular/permanent soft/contacts) covered up to optical limit; surgical sub-limit for eye procedures SR 20,000; no sub-limit for surgical treatments; refractive surgeries up to SR 20,000
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered - Up to Annual Limit, includes occupational/developmental therapy and rehabilitation
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Pre-authorization protocol standard applies. Medication limit equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Medical appliances and devices (basic), artificial limbs covered; allergy testing & treatment, hearing loss & delayed speech, skin disease (inc. pigmentation, acne, warts), insulin pumps & diabetic/freestyle libre systems (for 55+ or 12 & below), asthma, hypertension, doctor-prescribed devices, hip/knee replacement (including related management); hazardous sports injury covered.
